meals.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
meals.instructions: 1. Boil spaghetti. 2. Cook bacon. 3. Mix eggs, cheese, and pepper. 4. Combine all ingredients.

meals.name: Chicken Curry
meals.instructions: 1. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. 2. Add chicken and spices. 3. Simmer until cooked.

meals.name: Caesar Salad
meals.instructions: 1. Toss lettuce with dressing. 2. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese. 3. Serve.

meals.name: Beef Tacos
meals.instructions: 1. Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Assemble tacos with desired toppings.

meals.name: Mushroom Risotto
meals.instructions: 1. Sauté mushrooms and onions. 2. Add Arborio rice and broth gradually. 3. Stir until creamy.

meals.name: Grilled Salmon
meals.instructions: 1. Marinate salmon with olive oil, lemon, and herbs. 2. Grill until cooked through. 3. Serve.

meals.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
meals.instructions: 1. Stir-fry vegetables in sesame oil. 2. Add soy sauce and garlic. 3. Serve over rice.

meals.name: Chocolate Cake
meals.instructions: 1. Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, and eggs. 2. Bake until set. 3. Frost and decorate as desired.
